resources.string:
Iam Mounika. 

I love fish. 

The kind that is alive ans swims around in an aquarium or river, or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 
Fun Fact is that I have several aquariums and also a river. 
I like eating fish, too. Raw fish, Grilled fish, Smoked fish, Poached fish - not to much. 
And sometimes I even go fishing. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, When I was camping in Cananda, and very hungry,I even caught a large salmon with my hands. 

I'll be happy to tech you how to make your own aquarium. 
You shoukd ask someone else about fishing, though.
